snippet: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include a profile of Sheryl Sandberg, Facebook’s second-in-command, and a profile of Kevin Systrom, one of the men behind Instagram.
abstract: Friday’s highlights from around the Web include a profile of Sheryl Sandberg, Facebook’s second-in-command, and a profile of Kevin Systrom, one of the men behind Instagram.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Facebook's No. 2 and Instagram's Man of Vision
